ingredients.ingredient: ¼ cup pizza sauce, or as needed
½ cup shredded mozzarella cheese, or as needed
1 teaspoon dried parsley, or to taste

cookingTips: Cut zucchini evenly thick so they cook uniformly
Use a light hand with sauce to prevent soggy bites
Bake until cheese melts and zucchini is tender-crisp
enrichment.coachingPrompt: Guide the user through assembling and baking these quick pizza bites until cheese is bubbly.
